wikipedia_page.main: William Logie (20 September 1932 – 20 June 2016) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Cambuslang Rangers, Rangers, Aberdeen, Arbroath, Brechin City, and Alloa Athletic.

response: *20 June: Willie Logie, 83, Rangers, Aberdeen, Arbroath, Brechin City and Alloa Athletic wing half.
*Willie Logie, 83, Scottish footballer (Rangers).Obituary – Willie Logie, Rangers player whose tackle started mass brawl during European Cup campaign
